product_name: Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 800 2-Season Sleeping Bag - Women's
long_description: The women's Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 800 2-Season Sleeping Bag is built to move with you so you can sleep on your side, stomach or back. And, you can wear it like a jacket to read, cook and walk.
short_description: The women's Sierra Designs Mobile Mummy 800 2-Season Sleeping Bag is built to move with you so you can sleep on your side, stomach or back. And, you can wear it like a jacket to read, cook and walk.
